control.description-key: Allow you to fill in PDF files within Canvas Apps.

data-set.name: formDataSet
data-set.display-name-key: Dataset for filling in form. The required columns are Name, Type, and Data.

property.name: pdfTemplate
property.description-key: This should be the Base64 content of the PDF Template.

property.name: pdfOutput
property.description-key: The final filled PDF in Base64 string format

property.name: outputErrorMessage
property.description-key: If there is an error during the function call the message will be provided here.

property.name: outputError
property.description-key: If there is an error during the function call this value will be true.

property.name: fillPDF
property.description-key: Setting this value to true will start the fill of the PDF
